name: A Hero's Quest (connord)
description: A Hero’s Quest is a visual novel with minigames that follows the famed epic journey of the hero Odysseus across the ancient Greek world. His tale has been told for centuries, and now you can experience the challenges he faced in vivid detail. Play as Odysseus and meet the monsters, goddesses, and mortals of Homer’s Odyssey as you try to return home to Ithaka.
